channel.title: Pking shop doesnt work?
channel.description: i made a pk shop and i added pk points and all that but when i try to buy something it says i dont have enough pk poitns and the price is 500 coins (its acually pk points but it shows up as coins) but i have 1000 pk points

item.title: Pking shop doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

I have the same problem, and if i try and put chaotics in you can buy with coins, also, tell me if you have this problem: in pestcontrol if you try and put chaotics in the shop anyone can buy them.

Read full topic
